text: @IvankaTrump Unless U are one of the 130,000+ grieving families due to COVID-19 (& counting), a military family wondering why your Daddy is letting Putin pay the Taliban to hunt soldiers for cash or U are one of the millions unemployed=U & your family have done irreparable damage to the US

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
